programme.desc: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case - There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Rainbow's Lost Colors / Boots' Rubber Band Ball - The twins are excited to see their first rainbow, but it's missing its colors! Dora sets off to return its azul, rojo, y amarillo.

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Crabby Wedding / The Cloud Kingdom - Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora has to get the ring back!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The First Day Of School - Tomorrow is the Barbababies' first day of school.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Mountain Eater - Barbapapa tells the Barbababies about his extraordinary encounter with a wolf.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Greg the Brave / Hide and Squeak! - Greg pretends to be injured to avoid having to do a scary trick for his friends. // During a game of hide and seek, Lil Pal hides so well she can't be found.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S08 Ep805
programme.desc: Monster Machine Rescue Team - Blaze must complete three amazing rescues to join the greatest emergency vehicle team in Axle City: the Monster Machine Rescue Team!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Stuntmania! - Darington has built the ultimate stunt-track, and every Monster Machine in town is coming to see the show!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep702
programme.desc: Pups Save Election Day / Pups Save the Bubble Monkeys - When Mayor Humdinger runs for Mayor of Adventure Bay, his Mayor Mobile runs out of control, the Paw Patrol have to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save an Antarctic Martian / Pups Save the Maze Explorers - Travelling Travis is on another great adventure when he lands in Antarctica but believes he's actually on Mars. // Mr. Porter and Alex go on a sightseeing hike but get trapped inside a huge maze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pony - Priscilla the pony gets the chance to help the Paw Patrol rescue their own vehicle after they help her out of a canyon.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments - When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm - Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Tiny Dancer / The Sleepy Sun - Dora shows the twins a music box with a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life! Bailarina's adelita boots run away, so we need to get them back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Ice Ice Vola / Do or Diary - Vola trains to become an amazing hockey player in just one day. // Chucks tries to learn everything he can about teen fishies to get closer to his stepsister, Maddie.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Sharkdog Home Alone - When the Fishers go to the movies, Sharkdog is left home alone for the first time.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep109
programme.desc: My Fair Sharkdog - Max and Dennis compete to decide whose 'dog' is the best.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shark Marks the Spot - Royce wants to go on a treasure hunt with Max, but Max is distracted with Sharkdog.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Bedtime Story - Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Child Of The Stars I / Child Of The Stars II - Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. // The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Going With The Flow / The Decoder - The Barbababies are bored, the rain is preventing them from playing outside. // Barbibul has created a clever decoder capable of translating the cries of animals.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant / Paddington and the Accidental Hero - Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Sneezing Cold - Gabby, Blaze and AJ are out in the wilderness when they get a call, Blaze's friends have come down with a sickness called the Sneezles!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Pups Find a Genie / Pups Save a Tightrope Walker - Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Pups Save a Goldrush / Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, its a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Funny Fish / Club Cool - Goldie embraces her serious side to impress a director from Chomp City. // Everyfishy wants to join Shadow's cool new club.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep220
programme.desc: The Barbababies Have Got Talent / Triple Switcheroo - Every barbababy is invited to show their greatest talent on stage. // Video games are fun, but you also need to know how to enjoy the nice weather!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep215
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Indoor Skydiving Center / The Crew Builds A Roller Rink - Mayor Greatway and Mr. Ducky-Doo want to show their skydiving skills. But when wind gets in the way, the pups help them sky dive on the ground!

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Tio Tesoro's Treasure / The Great Key Mystery - Dora, Boots, and Map help To Tesoro find his treasure trackers and become a treasure map again.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep403
programme.desc: The Chicken Circus! - Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Unfetch - When Sharkdog fetches items that belong to the residents of Foggy Springs, Max needs to help him return them all before anyone notices.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Sharkdoghouse - Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Sharkdog Digs In - Dad desperately wants to win Garden of the Year but when Sharkdog destroys the garden right before judging, the Sharkpack needs to step in and put it all in order.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Whale Songs / Tell-Tale Scooter - Hank gets a bad case of stage fright when his dad asks him to sing a song in the Whale Choir. // Baby Shark accidentally breaks William's new scooter and hides the evidence.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Operation Ernie - Baby and William try to help Ernie make a best friend.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bay / Pups Save a Goodway - Ryder and the PAW Patrol clean up a small oil spill in the water to save the animals in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hot Potato - Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep150

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep151
programme.desc: The Amazing Guesser - After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn / Banana - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Bee's Knees Tea - When the Queen Bee comes to a Stump tea party, Chef's determined to put on a party fit for a queen.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Rain - A cloud appears in Teletubbyland and it rains. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po watch the flowers bloom. Another cloud appears and it rains pink, Tubby Custard!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep8

programme.desc: Curry Quest - Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.desc: Holi Festival of Colour, India - Glitch takes all of the colourful powder from the Festival of Colour in Dwarka, India. Can the Go Jetters get it back?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Shops - Playing 'Shops' is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing who's who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Andy and The Darkling Beetle - Andy checks out the Darkling Beetle, a nocturnal insect with bright markings. Andy heads to the Namib desert in Africa to discover how a darkling beetle drinks water.

programme.desc: Unicorse - Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Curry Quest - Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Chinese New Year, Dragon Dance Drama - Kyan's invited to perform a dragon dance for Chinese New Year in Beijing. Glitch decides to build a fire breathing dragon robot for the parade and The Go Jetters need to stop it!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Holi Festival of Colour, India - Glitch takes all of the colourful powder from the Festival of Colour in Dwarka, India. Can the Go Jetters get it back?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Wagon Ride - Bluey can't wait to get to the monkey bars as Dad takes her and Bingo on a wagon ride to the park. But her patience is tested when Dad keeps stopping to chat with other grown-ups.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Shops - Playing 'Shops' is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing who's who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Andy and The Darkling Beetle - Andy checks out the Darkling Beetle, a nocturnal insect with bright markings. Andy heads to the Namib desert in Africa to discover how a darkling beetle drinks water.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mission: Party Time - Disability assistance dog Tinks is determined to help her owner Charli feel confident enough to go to a party.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Captain's Best Bits - In this special compilation episode, Squawk takes us on a journey to find Captain Captain's top Swashbuckle moments. We will see her silliest songs, most marvellous moments and messiest slops.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep2
programme.desc: The Whistling Badge - The Squirrels want to learn how to whistle.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Making Music Badge - When the Squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Hollywood, USA - Glitch is not happy when he has to work with Kyan in a Hollywood film.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Sami Reindeer Herding, Norway - The Go Jetters are in snowy Norway to learn about the Sami reindeer. The reindeers are migrating and need to get a ferry to their warmer summer home.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep14
programme.desc: Wish You Were Here - While working on the Chinese railway, Thomas misses his friend Percy, and takes a trip down the memory lane.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Edwards vs. Brady
programme.desc: Prelims - Former UFC welterweight champion Leon Edwards begins his road back to the belt at Londons O2 Arena on March 22, as he faces Philly tough Sean Brady in a UFC Fight Night main event. A hard-charging force on fight night, Brady has put together back-to-back wins over Kelvin Gastelum and Gilbert Burns heading into the biggest night of his career against the fighting pride of Birmingham, England, who aims to use a win over Brady to propel himself into an opportunity to regain his 170-pound title.
